text:
Uber | Palo Alto or San Francisco HQ | Full-Time, Onsite

As a member of the Data Platform Engineering team, you will be doing just that- building and scaling a data workflow platform that enables reliable, trustworthy, and approachable data delivered to thousands of Uber employees. Your software will deliver, model, curate, data that powers core data platforms at Uber.

Stack: Python, Java and other homegrown services.

We are looking for upto two mid-level to senior software engineers to join our team.

To learn more or apply, feel free to drop me a line with subject 'HN - Who's Hiring' at amody+hn-april-2018(at)<company-name>(dot)com
